title.rendered: Back To The Future 5 Pack + 5 FREE Gorilla Gas Feminized Seeds | Auto Promo Pack*

content.rendered:
The NEW Tastebudz Auto Promo Pack: 2 Wild Strains & 10 Seeds Total!

5 X Back To The Future Auto Seeds & 5 X Gorilla Gas Auto Seeds

🛸 A Galactic Journey: The Back to the Future strain, meticulously crafted by Tastebudz Syndicate, amalgamates the mighty Gorilla Glue 4 strain, also known as Original Glue strain, with the extra-terrestrial Alien Tahoe OG. Each toke propels you into a cosmic adventure, reflecting the might of its parent strains.

🌿 Rapid and Robust Growth: This towering Indica strain, perfect for those in pursuit of speedy harvests, is adorned with compact buds enveloped in a thick layer of resin. Its autoflowering cycle ensures prolific indoor yields of up to 650 g/m^2. Outdoor cultivators can anticipate a bountiful 1500 g/plant yield.

🌌 Celestial Elevation: The Back to the Future weed strain doesn’t merely tickle the taste buds. With a THC concentration peaking at 27% and a predominant Indica makeup, it guarantees moments of bliss followed by profound tranquillity.

🌼 A Cosmic Symphony of Terpenes: The rich terpene profile is brimming with notes of Alpha Cedrene, Alpha Pinene, Alpha Terpineol, Limonene, and Linalool. It’s a testament to Tastebudz Syndicate‘ commitment to excellence within our autoflowering cannabis seeds.

🌟 Supreme Autoflowering Seeds: With the Back to the Future strain, you’re selecting top-notch autoflowering seeds that seamlessly merge heritage with innovation.

💨 Adherence to the Law: In line with cannabis seeds UK laws, Tastebudz ensures the Back to the Future strain is sold as a collector’s item. Each seed is a representation of Tastebudz Syndicate‘ unmatched craftsmanship. Plus, revel in complimentary and free cannabis seeds with every purchase!

🌍 Hop on the Global Bandwagon: Tastebudz Syndicate‘ Back to the Future strain autoflower seeds are generating buzz globally. Amplify your collection with this universal marvel.

🎁 Special Bonus: 5 x Gorilla Gas Autoflower Cannabis Seeds

🦍 A Fusion of Strength and Flavour: Tastebudz Gorilla Gas Auto is a testament to genetic mastery, combining the fierce power of Chemdawg, the delectability of GSC (GMO), and the resilience of GG4 Auto. This hybrid delivers an impactful 25% THC level, ensuring a long-lasting, satisfying experience.

🍃 Effortless Growth, Impressive Yields: Catering to both newcomers and veteran growers, Gorilla Gas Auto strain is a grower’s delight, with a swift 8-9 weeks flowering time. Reap the rewards of up to 450 g/m² indoors and 130 g/plant outdoors.

🌞 Relaxation Redefined: The physical effects of Gorilla Gas Auto strain are profound and enduring. It’s the perfect choice for those seeking a relaxing escape from the daily grind.

🍋 An Exotic Taste Adventure: Every inhale of our Gorilla Gas strain is a journey through exotic lemon diesel notes, accentuated by a peppery undertone. The complex terpene profile, including Alpha Cedrene, D-Limonene, and more, creates a unique, unforgettable flavour.

🏆 Top-Tier Autoflowering Seeds: Opting for our Gorilla Gas strain means choosing a strain that excels in genetic quality and cultivation ease – a true hallmark of Tastebudz Syndicate, part of the Tastebudz Seeds Auto Mix pack.

🌱 Quality and Compliance: Tastebudz seeds are provided as collectible souvenirs, respecting UK laws. Each seed is a tribute to our commitment to excellence and genetic innovation.

🌐 A World-Class Cultivar: Gorilla Gas Auto strain by Tastebudz Syndicate is a global sensation, adored by cannabis enthusiasts worldwide. Expand your collection with this distinguished cultivar.

Disclaimer

Buying, selling, or trading feminized cannabis seeds in the UK is legally permissible, regardless of whether seeds are obtained domestically or from other European countries. However, it is your responsibility to research and comply with local laws and regulations before placing an order. All Tastebudz seeds sold as souvenirs only in full alignment wit UK laws.

excerpt.rendered:
⏰ Tastebudz Back to the Future Autoflower Seeds: Time-Warp Your Tastebudz! 🕰️

Step into the future with Tastebudz Back to the Future Auto Strain – a spectacular fusion of Gorilla Glue 4 strain and Alien Tahoe OG. Bask in the potency of its 27% THC, all packaged within the convenience of auto flowering feminized seeds. Sold as souvenirs only in accordance with cannabis seeds UK laws.

🎁 Special Bonus: Gorilla Gas Autoflower Feminized Seeds 🦍

Step into the world of potency with Tastebudz Gorilla Gas Autoflowering cannabis seeds. A robust hybrid of Chemdawg strain, GSC strain (GMO strain), and GG4 Auto, it boasts a staggering 25% THC for a deep, physical relaxation.
